createEventDescription.name: Name for this event
createEventDescription.maturationTime: The earliest expected time an outcome will be signed, given in ISO 8601 format
createEventDescription.maturationTimeSeconds: The earliest expected time an outcome will be signed, given in epoch second
createEventDescription.unit: The unit denomination of the outcome value
createEventDescription.precision: The precision of the outcome representing the base exponent by which to multiply the number represented by the composition of the digits to obtain the actual outcome value.
createEventDescription.base: The base in which the outcome value is decomposed
createEventDescription.numdigits: The max number of digits the outcome can have
createEventDescription.signed: Whether the outcomes can be negative

createEventErrors.negative: Value must be zero or more
createEventErrors.outcomeMinTwo: Must have at least two outcomes
